mapper.select: SELECT sysz.syszid,sysz.yhid,sysz.zjid,sysz.arrange,sysz.line,zjgl.zjmc,zjgl.fbsmc,zjgl.fbsbj,zjgl.zjqf,zjgl.width,zjgl.height, zjgl.zjlj,zjgl.zjlx,sysz.xh,zjgl.zylj FROM igams_sysz sysz LEFT JOIN igams_zjgl zjgl ON sysz.zjid = zjgl.zjid WHERE sysz.yhid = #{yhid} order by sysz.xh asc
mapper.insert:
insert into igams_sysz(syszid,yhid,zjid,arrange,line,xh) VALUES
(#{item.syszid}, #{item.yhid}, #{item.zjid}, #{item.arrange}, #{item.line}, cast(#{item.xh} as numeric))
